Posts.Title: The prognosis in not good RobinWendy BrokenHeart

Posts.Content: Dec 18, 2014 10:32PM - edited Dec 18, 2014 10:33PM by shawna41653 Wonderful post!! have had a hard time lately been sick and in the hospital but I am on the road to getting better. I have a little girl who thinks I hung the moon my niece . I have no children she is like my own plus more . I have a wonderful loving husband who needs me too and my parents and sister and I love the Lord he helps me get threw the days. Been stage 4 since Jan 2009 . I have seen all the people I stared chemo with slowly pass I am the last one and that is overwhelming to me but I feel God has a reason for keeping me here. I am only 48 and I want to live !!!
Posts.Title: 5 reasons to stay alive diana50 PattyPeppermint

Posts.Content: shawna41653 wrote: My Mother and hero gained her angel wings on May-17th at 1150 pm . I am truly blessed to have known her. She will no longer suffer from this horrible cancer. I can say one thing she never talked about dying she was too busy living. I miss her so so much. she was 48 years old. My heart aches for her so badly I feel so lost and alone but she is with me always . she has gone to where rainbows never die. she fought stage 4 breast cancer for 6 and one half years . she is a survivor ... miss you momma I was truly blessed we held and sung to you as you left us . you were never alone.. Dx 1/29/2009, IDC, Left, 4cm, Stage IV, metastasized to bone/liver, mets, ER+/PR+, HER2- Radiation Therapy 5/1/2014 Bone Chemotherapy 6/16/2014 Xeloda (capecitabine) Log in to post a reply

Posts.Content: shawna41653 wrote: I was dx in jan 2009, know  my dr has me on abraxetone a chemo drug, been on it for a few weeks, my tumor markers are way down, but a day or so after tx I have alwful chest pain it starts in my jaw and goes to my chest, My bllod pressure gets real low then shoots up to over 100, I take lisinoprial a blood pressure med, 10mg, what could be going on, I really need to contiune this tx but cant with these chest pains, my oncologist said it was not the chemo and told me to quit my blood pressure meds but today my bottom number is over 100 so I took it so any please help me, God Bless You all, other drugs i am on is warthin a blood thinner, nurotion for tingleing feet and hands, and a steriod dexamexthsson during my chemo tx, and I take loratab 5mg 4 times a day, and I also take benadryl, Thanks For any help, I just know there gonna figure this out my life depends on it  Dx 1/29/2009, IDC, Left, 4cm, Stage IV, metastasized to bone/liver, mets, ER+/PR+, HER2- Radiation Therapy 5/1/2014 Bone Chemotherapy 6/16/2014 Xeloda (capecitabine) Log in to post a reply
